use-lawful-reason: The site has been vacant and unused for over 8 years following cessation of the previous office use in 2015. The last lawful use was as Class E office premises under planning permission 98/2341/FUL. Although currently vacant, the building retains its lawful use rights for office purposes and could be reoccupied without requiring new planning permission.

documents.name: Business rates exemption records showing vacancy
